description: Destination's resource schema demonstrating some basic constructs and validation rules.

Key.markdownDescription:
---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Minimum Length: 1  
Maximum Length: 127  
Update requires: No interruption

Value.markdownDescription:
---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Minimum Length: 1  
Maximum Length: 255  
Update requires: No interruption

Tag.markdownDescription:
---

Required: No  
Update requires: No interruption

Name.markdownDescription:
Unique name of destination

---

Required: Yes  
Type: String  
Maximum Length: 128  
Pattern: [a-zA-Z0-9:_-]+  
Update requires: Replacement

Expression.markdownDescription:
Destination expression

---

Required: Yes  
Type: String  
Update requires: No interruption

ExpressionType.markdownDescription:
Must be RuleName

---

Required: Yes  
Type: String  
Allowed Values: RuleName | MqttTopic | SnsTopic  
Update requires: No interruption

Description.markdownDescription:
Destination description

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Maximum Length: 2048  
Update requires: No interruption

Tags.description: A list of key-value pairs that contain metadata for the destination.
Tags.markdownDescription:
A list of key-value pairs that contain metadata for the destination.

---

Required: No  
Type: Array  
Update requires: No interruption

RoleArn.description: AWS role ARN that grants access
RoleArn.markdownDescription:
AWS role ARN that grants access

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Minimum Length: 20  
Maximum Length: 2048  
Update requires: No interruption

Arn.description: Destination arn. Returned after successful create.
Arn.markdownDescription:
Destination arn. Returned after successful create.

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Update requires: No interruption
